HOME.TITLE: Daily Health Questionnaire
HOME.QUESTION_ONE: HAVE YOU HAD ANY COVID-19 SYMPTOMS IN THE LAST 24 HOURS? (COMMON SYMPTOMS INCLUDE LOSS OF SMELL OR TASTE, HEADACHE, FATIGUE, COUGH AS WELL AS FEVER OR DIFFICUTLY BREATHING)
HOME.QUESTION_TWO: HAVE YOU TESTED POSITIVE FOR COVID-19 IN THE LAST 10 DAYS?
HOME.QUESTION_THREE: ARE YOU CURRENTLY AWAITING COVID-19 TEST RESULTS (WHEN THE TEST IS BASED ON EXPOSURE OR SYMPTOMS)?
HOME.QUESTION_FOUR: Do you agree to abide by Nike's safety precautions including but not limited to social distancing, wearing face coverings and hand sanitizing?
HOME.QUESTION_FIVE: HAVE YOU BEEN ASKED TO QUARANTIVE BY A GOVERNMENT, PUBLIC HEALTH AUTHORITY OR YOUR EMPLLYER BECAUSE OF TRAVEL OR POTENTIAL EXPOSURE?
HOME.QUESTION_SIX: HAVE YOU BEEN IN CLOSE CONTACT WITH ANYONE WHO HAS TESTED POSIVITE IN THE LAST 10 DAYS?
HOME.QUESTION_RATING: HOW COMFORTABLE DO YOU FEEL WORKING IN TODAY'S ENVIRONMENT AND THE PRECAUTIONS NIKE HAS PUT IN PLACE?
HOME.NAME: Name
HOME.ERROR: No se pudieron obtener los detalles de la ubicación. Inténtelo de nuevo más tarde ...!
HOME.STATEMENT_ONE: We ask all employees to do your part. Each day, before coming to work, you should conduct self-wellness checks at home. If you experience symptoms aligned to COVID-19, such as fever, cough or difficulty breathing, stay home.
HOME.STATEMENT_TWO: Please also go through these questions below. If your answer is yes to any of them, do not come to work, contact your Manager or HR Direct immediately and follow up with your health care provider.
HOME.QUESTION_SEVEN: HAVE YOU BEEN ASKED TO QUARANTINE BY A GOVERNMENT, PUBLIC HEALTH AUTHORITY OR YOUR EMPLOYER BECAUSE OF TRAVEL OR POTENTIAL EXPOSURE?
